data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Rushen.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rushen, Isle of Man
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 2,000 citizens of Rushen, Isle of Man, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Rushen, Isle of Man to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Rushen to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Port Saint Mary
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Port Saint Mary, Rushen, Isle of Man.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Rushen against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Rushen.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Rushen, Isle of Man to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

location.name: Rushen
location.cities_list: Port Erin, Castletown, Port Saint Mary, Ballasalla, Ballabeg
